item.title: Multiple pallets left ready for having a fire below the tree, 2nd November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Gloscat Cheltenham Campus Princess Elizabeth Way, Cheltenham

item.title: Blocked drain, 31st October
item.description:
